vstore.framework.utils

Class ContextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.utils.ContextUtils

  • public class ContextUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some convenience functions for working with context.

    • Method Detail

      • distanceBetween

        public static float distanceBetween(VLatLng one,
                                    VLatLng two)
        Calculates the distance between two given latitude/longitude pairs in meters. Taken from: https://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/44st/Location.java.html
        Parameters:
        one - The first pair.
        two - The second pair.
        Returns:
        The distance between the two pairs in meters.

      • isNowBetween

        public static boolean isNowBetween(int startHour,
                                   int startMinutes,
                                   int endHour,
                                   int endMinutes)
        Determines if the current time is between the given time.
        Parameters:
        startHour - The starting hour of the time span to check for (0-23)
        startMinutes - The starting minutes of the time span to check for (0-23)
        endHour - The end hour of the time span to check for
        endMinutes - The end minutes of the time span to check for
        Returns:
        True, if the current time of today lies in the given time span.

      • isDateBetween

        public static boolean isDateBetween(java.util.Date d,
                                    int startHour,
                                    int startMinutes,
                                    int endHour,
                                    int endMinutes)
        Determines if the time of the given date object lies in the given time span.
        Parameters:
        d - The date object for which the time is checked.
        startHour - The starting hour of the time span to check for (0-23)
        startMinutes - The starting minutes of the time span to check for (0-23)
        endHour - The end hour of the time span to check for
        endMinutes - The end minutes of the time span to check for
        Returns:
        True, if the time of the given date lies in the given time span.

      • isWeekend

        public static boolean isWeekend(java.util.Date d)
        Checks, if the given date is on a weekend or not.
        Parameters:
        d - The date object for which the weekday is checked.
        Returns:
        True, if it is weekend. False, if not.

      • getDayOfWeek

        public static int getDayOfWeek()
        Returns:
        The current day of the week (1=monday and 7=sunday).

      • isIncludedInSharingDomain

        public static boolean isIncludedInSharingDomain(int domain1,
                                                int domain2)
        Checks, if sharing domain 1 is included in sharing domain 2.
        Parameters:
        domain1 - The sharing domain to check against sharing domain 2.
        domain2 - The sharing domain that is checked against.
        Returns:
        True, if the sharing domain 1 is included in the sharing domain 2.
